title: Hezekiah Cleanses the Temple
summary: Hezekiah begins his reign by reopening the temple and calling the priests to purify it. He restores worship, offers sacrifices, and leads the people in renewed devotion to God. Joy and unity return to Judah.

faq.question: What was Hezekiahâ€™s first major act as king?
faq.answer: He reopened and cleansed the temple, restoring proper worship.

faq.question: How did the people respond?
faq.answer: They rejoiced as the worship of God was reestablished with singing and offerings.
